project_description: Roof Mounted Solar- 24 Module 10.92kW, ESS- 1x Tesla PW3 13.5kWh coupled with 1x Tesla PW3 13.5kWh Expansion Unit, 40ft Trench Through Dirt, 6ft Trench Through Concrete
reasoning: This is a high-value homeowner ($909k property) with a specific, high-ticket solar and battery storage project. The detailed technical description indicates serious intent and planning, not price shopping. While 14 days old is at the edge of freshness for some trades, the complexity and cost of this integrated system mean the decision cycle is longer, and the lead is still very warm for a premium electrical or solar contractor.
ideal_contractor: Premium electrical contractor specializing in solar and battery backup installations, or a high-end solar integrator.
flags: Project is technically complex (solar + dual Powerwalls + trenching)|Lead is 14 days old, but acceptable for this project type
